articles.content:
The NBA postseason is here, and the 75th season in league history could deliver one of its most wide-open chases to the title.
The Phoenix Suns ran away with the league's best regular-season record … [+47654 chars]

articles.title: Ramiz's quadrangular T20s idea turned down; Barclay to finish his term in November - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Given that the ICC events schedule is now fixed for the next cycle, fitting another tournament was a non-starter
articles.content: How much more will emerge once he's back in office, as Ramiz tweeted, is also not certain  •  PCB
